titles.title: Albuquerque Biological Park Title Clarification Act
Albuquerque Biological Park Title Clarification Act
Albuquerque Biological Park Title Clarification Act
Albuquerque Biological Park Title Clarification Act
A bill to clear title to certain real property in New Mexico associated with the Middle Rio Grande Project, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici without amendment. With written report No. 109-18.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 29.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Subcommittee on Water and Power Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 109-311.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 169.

bill.summary: 11/18/2005--Reported to House without amendment. Albuquerque Biological Park Title Clarification Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to issue a quitclaim deed conveying any right, title, and interest the United States may have in and to Tingley Beach and San Gabriel Park in Albuquerque, New Mexico, to the City of Albuquerque. Provides that the City shall not be required to pay any additional costs for the value of such Park and Beach.
